summary.span: 可以在程序集、类型或方法粒度方面设置协定和工具选项。

span.span: Enables you to set contract and tool options at assembly, type, or method granularity.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: The category of the option to be set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有两个类别/设置选项，并且它们可由任一构造函数重载设置。There are only two category/setting options, and they can be set by either of the constructor overloads. 您可通过按字符串格式指定“true”或“false”来使用此重载（具有与 重载相同的设置）；例如：You can use this overload with the same settings as the overload by specifying "true" or "false" in string format; for example: ``` [ContractOption("contract", "inheritance", "false")] class MyConcurrentList : IList { ... } ```
